result.execSummary:
The defendant Shawn A Posthuma was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Shawn A Posthuma is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Shawn A Posthuma was found guilty of Possess Drug Paraphernalia, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.573(1).
  • Shawn A Posthuma was found guilty of Possession of THC, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(e).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

miscConds.notes: If probation is revoked or will discharge with outstanding financial obligations due, a civil judgment shall be entered for the balance due.
Complete AODA and comply with all treatment recommendations.

records.addlTxt: Columbia County Court Conviction DNA - DNA taken

Defendant Shawn A Posthuma in court with attorney Timothy Robert Verhoff.  Brenda L. Yaskal appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Sentencing statements by attorneys. 18 months probation  Court went over the rights & elements. Defendant pled no contest to count 2&3. Court found defendant guilty, entered judgment, sentence withheld, 18 months probation, $443 costs, $243 costs. Complete AODA and comply with all treatment recommendations. Ct. 1 dismissed. No contest plea to OWI, $761.50 fine, 6 mo. revocation. Complete AODA and comply with all treatment recommendations.15TR4914R dismissed.

Defendant Shawn A Posthuma in court with attorney John Bradley on behalf of Timothy Robert Verhoff.  Crystal N Long appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Atty Bradley requested matter be set with Br. 3 for sentencing.  15TR4873 and 15TR4914 will track with.
For Leave to File Additional Motions filed by ADA Long
and Notice of DNA and Witness List filed by ADA Long
ADA  Long's discovery letter to Atty. Verhoff
for Discovery filed by Atty. Timothy Verhoff

Defendant, Shawn A Posthuma, appeared in custody with Atty. Amanda Riek of the public defender's office.  Jane E. Kohlwey appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  $1,000 recog. bond with felony conds. Time limits waived.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for September 30, 2015 at 02:00 pm.  Return date scheduled for October 21, 2015 at 02:45 pm.
